summary: Tutoring platform which connects students with new tutors by proximity.

Web form system built for the Pakistani Consulate. Applicants can fill and submit forms which are administrated by different tiers of administration. Includes support for file upload & mobile responsive.
As part of our university capstone project, we built a virtual reality simulation of the solar system.
HeyFam helps you find the best places to meet up with friends using a distance matrix algorithm based on transport routes.
Developed a prototype version of campus maps for the university to significantly improve student experience.
